programme.desc: An FBI agent must negotiate with a woman holding a hospital hostage in order to get her hands on an experimental drug.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Sarah searches for her missing roommate. Jay endures Pete’s revenge as Kappa Psi sisters prep for Gamma Fair.

programme.title: Inspiring Love
programme.desc: When Isla’s art unexpectedly sells to Mark, a second commission sees them falling in love.

programme.title: The Happiness Playbook
programme.desc: Journalist Amy goes undercover at a happiness retreat and falls for Paul, the investor’s son.

programme.title: Hearts Under the Olive Tree
programme.desc: Suffering from writer’s block, an author heads to a farmland retreat to get inspired.

programme.title: Food for the Heart
programme.desc: After taking on too much with her meal delivery service, Lia accepts her neighbor Eli’s help.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: Alice is up for partner at her firm and hires her sister’s manny, Jacob, to help with her daughter.

programme.title: The Bouquet
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters set aside their differences to help their mother save her floral business.

programme.title: My Daddy is In Heaven
programme.desc: Becca and Adam Smith along with their 5-year-old daughter Acie are a perfect family until a tragedy strikes.

programme.title: Fatal Memories
programme.desc: In this thriller, a woman tries to help her sister recall the events of the fatal stabbing of their mother.

programme.title: Blood And Black Lace
programme.desc: Beautiful models are being brutally murdered and an inspector is assigned to the case, but not before more gruesome killings occur. Bava is, as usual, violent and suspenseful.

programme.title: The Black Panther
programme.desc: A gung-ho ex-military man pursues a secret life of crime, culminating in the kidnapping of a teenage heiress.

programme.title: Shogun's Ninja
programme.desc: In the middle of the 16th century, Hideyoshi, a power hungry warlord sets out to destroy the Momochi clan. He sends his war commander in search of the clan's hidden gold only to find that two daggers are the key to the hiding place of the treasured gold. Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.desc: Grace, who is vacationing in Paris with her friends and stepsister, is mistaken for a British heiress. Later, the three women are whisked away to Monte Carlo, where they discover royalty and romance.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: Five couples from Atlanta buckle up to deal with the joys and sorrows of having a baby for the first time. However, they soon realise that parenthood demands a lot more than they anticipated.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A neurotic thirty-something woman resolves to finally take control of her life once and for all, while looking for h love.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Eight very different couples and their love lives intertwine during a hectic month before Christmas in London.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: While playing on a cruise ship, the chipmunks and the chipettes take their pranks too far and end up stranded on a tropical island, only to discover it is not as deserted as it seems.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Billionaire Thomas Crown is bored with his life and starts stealing precious works of art. However, he meets his match in Catherine Banning, an insurance investigator looking into the thefts.
